page.title: 09RECREATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: CHILDREN BORDER LEISURE CENTRE- is a pool parlour, with arcade machines. On Nook Street. BROWNIES, GUIDES,CUBS AND SCOUTS-there are 4 packs of each in the town, associated with the main churches. MUSIC CENTRE- every Saturday in Stainburn school. JR's- this is a pool parlour on Jane St., and a Roller Disco on Harrington Rd. YOUTH CLUBS- there are several of these, offering a wide variety of indoor and outdoor persuits, particularly the latter, being so close to the Lake District. CADET FORCES- Army, Sea and Airforce cadet groups are very active. ENTERTAINMENTS- local football(the Reds) and rugby (Workington Town),cinema.
